Kia Mard Ya Aurat Napaaki Ki Halat Mein Durood Shareef Parh Sakte Hain Maslan Halat E Janabat Ya Auraton Ke Makhsoos Ayyam Mein Aur Yeh Bhi Bata Dein Ki Kya Namaz Ki Tarah Durood Shareef Parhne Ke Liye Bhi Ba Wudhu Hona Parega ?

Durood E Lakhi, Durood E Maahi, Durood E Ghausiya, Durood E Taj Aur Qaseedah Burda Shareef Mein Aane Wale Alfaaz Inka Wajeefey Ke Taur Par Parhna Kaisa Hai ?

Nabi ﷺ Ka Farmaan Hai Ki Meri Qabar Par Allah Ek Farishta Mukarrar Farmayega Jo Door Ya Nazdeeq Se Durood O Salaam Sun Ne Ki Taaqat Rakhega Aur Aap ﷺ Ko Batayega Ki Fulaan Bin Fulaan Ne Aap Par Durood O Salaam Bheja Hai Hai Iski Kya Haqeeqat Hai ?

timestamps.text: Introduction
Islam Mein Muharram Ul Haram K Mahiney Ki Ehmiat Aur Fazilat Kya Hai?

Molana Tariq Jameel Ki Janib Se Kch Arsay Se Sayyiduna Ali A.s. Ko Maula Ali Kehne Ki Targheeb Dilai Ja Rahi Hai. Lekin Deoband K Apne Maktaba E Fikr Se Hi Unki Shadeed Mukhalifat Ho Rahi Hai Is Muamle Mein. To Aik Aam Admi Kidhar Jaey?
Tasal Ki Waja Se Har Firqe Mein Kharabian Ai Hain. Mehsoos Ye Hota Hai K Ap K Andar Bhi Ai Hain. Ap Ne Abhi Durood Shion Ki Tarha Parhtay Hain. Kya Apne Tasal Mein Aisay Parha Tha?

Ahle Sunnat Ki Janib Se Haq Chaar Yaar Ka Nara Lagaya Jata Hai. Jabke Doosri Jabi Ahle Tashayyu Israr Karte Hain K Panj Tan Paak Ka Nara Lagaya Jaey. Aik Aam Musalman Kis Taraf Jaey Aur Kiski Sunay? Aur Makkah Mein Aik Shakhs Panj Tan Paak K Nara Laganay Ko Kafir Kehta Hai Jabke Usko Haq Chaar Yaar Se Koi Masla Nahi. Iski Kya Daleel Hai?
Ahle Sunnat K Ulama Khaas Tor Se Muharram Mein Kehte Hain K Kala Libaas Pehenna Jahannamion Ka Shuaar Hai. Is Liye Kalay Kapre Pehenna Haram Hai. Ap Is Baray Mein Kya Kehte Hain?
Ap Ne Maulana Tariq Jameel Sahab Ki Kitab Guldasta Ahle Bait Ko Promote Kia Tha. Lekin Us Mein Bhi Sayyiduna Husain A.s. Ki Taraf Jhoota Afsana Mansoob Hai. Is Hawale Se Ap Kya Kehte Hain?
Ap Zakir Naik Ki Bohot Tareef Karte Hain Lekin Unho Ne Bhi Ibn Taymiyyah Ki Taqleed Mein Jannati Lashkar Wali Basharat Yazid Bin Muawiya Fasiq O Fajir Par Fit Ki Hai.
Apki Nazar Mein Dor E Jadeed Mein Ahle Sunnat K Konse Ulama Or Akabir Hain Jinho Ne Muhabbat E Ahle Bait Ko Ilmi Satah Par Muta'arif Karwaya Hai?
Agar Aaj Maulana Ishaq Zinda Hotay Aur Ap Unke Mukhtalif Interviews Karte To Ummat K Liye Ye Kis Tarha Ka Muamla Hota?
Umooman Nasibi Ulama Ki Janib Se Durood Mein Aal E Muhammad Se Murad Ummat E Muhammadia Ko Lia Jata Hai. Kya Unka Ye Moaqqif Ilmi Aitebar Se Durust Hai?
Sayyiduna Husain A.s. Ko Sayyid Ul Shuhada Ka Laqab Kyun Dia Jata Hai Kabke Rasoolullah Ne Ye Laqab Khud Apni Zindagi Mein Uhud K Muqam Par Hazrat Hamza Ko Dia Tha?
Baaz Nasibi Ulama Kehte Hain K Imam Husain A.s. K Naam K Sath Imam Nahi Lagana Chahiye Isse Shia Hazrat K Aqeeday Ki Boo Ati Hai. Is Baray Mein Apka Kya Kehna Hai?

Yazeed K Madina Wale Kaarname Pe Roshni Daal Dein?

Kya Nabi S.a.w.w Ne Farmaya Tha K Khilafat Quraish Mein Rehni Chahiye?

Maula Ali K Aik Baitay Hain, Muhammad Bin Hanafiya, Unke Baray Mein Ata Hai K Unho Ne Hazrat Muawiya K Khilaf Jang Bhi Ki Thi. Lekin Ye Bhi Ata Hai K Unho Ne Yazeed Ki Tareef Bhi Ki Thi. To Aisa Tazaad Kaise Ho Sakta Hai?
Jab Hum Ahle Sunnat Ki Kitabon Se Ahle Bait Ki Shaan Bayan Karte Hain To Log Kehte Hain K Woh Riwayat Shia Raawion Se Li Gai Hain Ap Humein Kyun Pesh Kar Rahe Hain. Inka Kya Jawab Dia Jaey?
Qurb E Qiyamat Mein Imam Mahdi A.s. Ka Zuhur Hoga. Hamein Kaise Pata Chale Ga? Shia Kahein Ge Woh Shia Hain. Sunni Kahein Ge Woh Sunni Hain.

Ayat E Tatheer Ki Roshni Mein Ahle Bait Kon Kon Hain?

Ayat E Mubahala Ki Roshni Mein Panj Tan Paak Kay Baray Main Wazahat Kar Dein.
